name: Free Call Now Button by InstaContact – Best WordPress Click To Call Plugin
author: InstaContact Team

sections.description:
WordPress Free Call Now Button

Did you know that about 65% of people prefer to contact a business by phone call versus only 24% who prefer a web form? Also, over 50% of website traffic is on a mobile device! Don’t lose your website customers on mobile or desktop! InstaContact helps you connect instantly with your website visitors and accelerate sales using highly engaging click to call buttons (free) and other high conversion popup optin forms, request a callback, and scheduling meeting tools (paid).

InstaContact App
InstaContact is a standalone application that integrates with all web platforms including WordPress. You must have an InstaContact account in order to take advantage of this plugin. Click here to learn more about InstaContact.

The 100% free version of InstaContact comes with an easy to use call now button builder and call routing options for one call agent. You can create stylish and engaging buttons that display on both mobile and desktop devices, even customizing the click to call button with your own branding. The builder also has call now button animations, color picker, and page level configurations.
InstaContact can also be seamlessly upgraded to paid plans, that include even more powerful lead generation and customer acquisition technologies to further boost your website sales and save on your marketing costs.

Let’s take a look at how InstaContact can help you generate more inbound calls, leads & sales.

InstaContact App
InstaContact is a standalone application that integrates with all web platforms including WordPress. You must have an InstaContact account in order to take advantage of this plugin. Click here to learn more about InstaContact. There is a free tier with the best call now button for WordPress and paid tiers that include more advanced lead generation and inbound marketing solutions.

FREE Features List

  • Free click to call button builder
  • Customizable button callout message text
  • 5+ Call now button style options
  • Infinite button color themes to fit your website design
  • Responsive, mobile call now buttons
  • Desktop and tablet compatible click to call buttons
  • Floating buttons can be positioned left, right, center, top or bottom
  • Button animations to drive higher visitor conversion to inbound call
  • Call routing and forwarding to company or individual phone numbers
  • Click tracking and reporting

Full Features List

There is so much more that InstaContact can do to help improve your business and sales process. Learn more about InstaContact Plans and Pricing and how InstaContact’s powerful features help increase your visitor conversion to calls and leads with engaging website popups, optin forms, callback request widgets and schedule meeting tools. All in the Best Customer Acquisition Plugin for Business Websites.

Credits

This plugin is created by InstaContact Team

What’s Next

If you like this free plugin, then consider checking out our paid plan features:

  • InstaContact’s Features – Best Customer Acquisition Plugin for Business Websites: Create Popups, Optin Forms, Callbacks and Schedule Meetings.

Press & Brand Assets

If you are interested in writing about InstaContact, then we have have prepared a Press & Brand Assets page where you can download our logo, boilerplate, and other relevant assets.

When mentioning InstaContact please know that InstaContact is one word with a Capital I and C.

Please avoid using any variations like: Instacontact, Insta Contact, and insta contact

Notes

InstaContact is the best Free WordPress call now button and WordPress lead generation plugin available to professionals, SMBs and enterprise businesses. No other WordPress popup plugin or WordPress optin form solution compares to InstaContact and the integrated email, phone, and messaging features it offers.
sections.installation:
1. Install InstaContact either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate InstaContact.
  3. Navigate to the InstaContact tab at the bottom of your admin menu and enter your InstaContact API Username and API Key to connect your InstaContact account to your WordPress site.
sections.faq:
I downloaded this plugin but don’t have an InstaContact account. How can I get one?

You can sign up for an InstaContact account by visiting our signup page and following the instructions.

How is InstaContact different than most other WordPress plugins?

InstaContact is different than most other plugins. Most plugins cost you money. InstaContact helps your business make more money. InstaContact can also help save your business costs of advertising, marketing and sales. InstaContact is also updated regularly to provide you with more valuable features and powerful functionalities.
